url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Vampires/Example Vampires/Vampire Spawn/Vampire Spawn/Creating a Vampire Spawn/Special Attacks

sections.body: A vampire spawn gains a vampire's blood drain and dominate special attacks. The vampire who created the spawn can influence a spawn's dominated creature as if she had dominated it herself.

sections.name: Energy Drain
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Vampires/Example Vampires/Vampire Spawn/Vampire Spawn/Creating a Vampire Spawn/Special Attacks/Energy Drain

sections.body: : A creature hit by a vampire spawn's slam (or other natural weapon) gains 1 negative level. This ability only triggers only once per round.

name: Special Attacks
